verses.verse: By night<WH3915> on<WH5921> my bed<WH4904> I sought<WH1245> him whom my soul<WH5315> loves:<WH157> I sought<WH1245> him, but I found<WH4672> him not.

I will rise<WH6965> now,<WH4994> and go<WH5437> about<WH5437> the city<WH5892> in the streets,<WH7784> and in the broad<WH7339> ways<WH7339> I will seek<WH1245> him whom my soul<WH5315> loves:<WH157> I sought<WH1245> him, but I found<WH4672> him not.
The watchmen<WH8104> that go<WH5437> about<WH5437> the city<WH5892> found<WH4672> me: to whom I said, Saw<WH7200> you him whom<WH853> my soul<WH5315> loves?<WH157>

It was but a little<WH4592> that I passed<WH5674> from them, but I found<WH4672> him whom my soul<WH5315> loves:<WH157> I held<WH270> him, and would not let him go,<WH7503> until<WH5704> I had brought<WH935> him into<WH413> my mother's<WH517> house,<WH1004> and into<WH413> the chamber<WH2315> of her that conceived<WH2029> me.

I charge<WH7650> you, O you daughters<WH1323> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> by the roes,<WH6643> and by the hinds<WH355> of the field,<WH7704> that you stir<WH5782> not up, nor<WH518> awake<WH5782> my love,<WH160> till<WH5704> he please.<WH2654>

Who<WH4310> is this<WH2063> that comes<WH5927> out of the wilderness<WH4057> like pillars<WH8490> of smoke,<WH6227> perfumed<WH6999> with myrrh<WH4753> and frankincense,<WH3828> with all<WH3605> powders<WH81> of the merchant?<WH7402>
Behold<WH2009> his bed,<WH4296> which is Solomon's;<WH8010> three score<WH7657> valiant<WH1368> men are about<WH5439> it, of the valiant<WH1368> of Israel.<WH3478>
They all<WH3605> hold<WH270> swords,<WH2719> being expert<WH3925> in war:<WH4421> every man<WH376> has his sword<WH2719> on his thigh<WH3409> because of fear<WH6343> in the night.<WH3915>
King<WH4428> Solomon<WH8010> made<WH6213> himself a chariot<WH668> of the wood<WH6086> of Lebanon.<WH3844>

He made<WH6213> the pillars<WH5982> thereof of silver,<WH3701> the bottom<WH7507> thereof of gold,<WH2091> the covering<WH4817> of it of purple,<WH713> the middle<WH8432> thereof being paved<WH7528> with love,<WH160> for the daughters<WH1323> of Jerusalem.<WH3389>

Go<WH3318> forth,<WH3318> O you daughters<WH1323> of Zion,<WH6726> and behold<WH7200> king<WH4428> Solomon<WH8010> with the crown<WH5850> with which his mother<WH517> crowned<WH5849> him in the day<WH3117> of his espousals,<WH2861> and in the day<WH3117> of the gladness<WH8057> of his heart.<WH3820>
